titles: The preceptes of warre, setforth [sic] by Iames the erle of Purlilia, and tra[n]slated into englysh by Peter Betham
author: Porcia, Jacopo di, conte, 15th cent.
Betham, Peter.
publisher: In the olde Iewery by Edwarde Whytchurche. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendu[m] solu[m] These bookes are to be solde at the weste dore of Pauls, by William Telotson],
notes: A translation of: Porcia, Jacopo di.  De re militari.
Printer's and bookseller's names from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Military art and science --  Early works to 1800.
